summary:
Do you ever wish to fly through the Skyrim on balloon ?
This mod will give you opportunity to made it !
And travel to the top of the mountain to Parthurnax will be much more interesting now.
Also you will get voiced mini-quest, new animated objects and much fun.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#f1c232][u][b][size=4]Description:[/size] [/b][/u][/color]
Creation begins from "[b][color=#6fa8dc]Skyforge[/color][/b]" in Whiterun. You must get new topic "[b][color=#6fa8dc]Ancient Engine[/color][/b]". There you can found all you need to construct.
You must to have perk "[b][color=#6fa8dc]Dwemer Equipment[/color][/b]" and some dwemer scrap pieces. You can found it inside any ruins of abandoned dwemer sites.
Other instructions will be granted to you as you progress through.

[size=3]Video from[b] Shinji72:[/b][/size]
[youtube]wLHEjNiKV-A[/youtube]
[size=4][u][b][color=#f1c232]Main features:[/color][/b][/u][/size]
- this [color=#6fa8dc][b]'engine'[/b][/color] can be easily used to create any flying stuff (like flying ship, island ...)
- many objects with new animation, sounds and FX
- unique crafting system
- movement to any accessible point of the Skyrim surface
- easy controls of the Balloon
[color=#6fa8dc][b][i]- Balloon can interact with any object in the world having collision[/i][/b].[/color]
- when moving you may walk in the basket of the Balloon
- when moving you may attack any creature from the basket of the Balloon
- you may shake the basket (just don't fall down)
- animated interactive elements of control of the Balloon
- rope of the anchor can be stretched and broken
- main ropes of the Balloon can be broken by fire (but can be repaired too)
[color=#6fa8dc][b][i]- assembling and movement of the Balloon based on Havok physics of the game engine[/i][/b][/color]
- Balloon has about 400 collision objects dynamically linked to each other
- Balloon assembling dynamically on your own eyes
- voiced mini-quest
  (voice is on Russian, sorry, but there are translated [u]subtitles[/u] at the top left corner of the screen)
[color=#6fa8dc]-[i] [b]Protection from console.[/b][/i][/color] Don't even think about to cheat the mod, you will be punished !
  (but actually I would like you to try to cheat ... you may be impressed :) )


[color=#f1c232][size=4]Requirements[/size]:[/color]        - none
[color=#f1c232][size=4]Incompatibilities[/size]:[/color]  - none
[color=#f1c232][size=4]Issues[/size]:[/color]                        - none


[size=4][u][b][color=#f1c232]Install:[/color][/b][/u][/size]
- Just unpack files from "[b][color=#6fa8dc]00. Core[/color][/b]" folder to the game's "[b][color=#6fa8dc]Data[/color][/b]" folder then activate "[b][color=#6fa8dc]Balloon with Havok.esp[/color][/b]" in launcher. 
  (or use WryeBash / NMM to install)

[b][u][size=4][color=#f1c232]Uninstall:[/color][/size][/u][/b]
- remove the Balloon by the spell
- save to the new slot
- delete all installed files of this mod

[size=4][u][b][color=#f1c232]Future plans:[/color][/b][/u][/size]
- read feedback and ... maybe, change something
author: Anton
